config.title: Listen to the scenario and answer questions

questions.scenario: You are at a restaurant with your friend. The waiter asks what you want to order. You want a salad and some water.

questions.text: What do you want to eat?
What do you want to drink?

questions.scenario: You need to catch a bus to the city center. The next bus comes in fifteen minutes.

questions.text: Where do you need to go?
questions.template: I need to go to the ___________.

questions.scenario: Your friend invites you to see a movie on Saturday evening. You are free that day.

questions.text: What does your friend want to do?
questions.template: My friend wants to see a ___________.

questions.scenario: You are looking for your keys. You think you left them on the kitchen table.

questions.text: Where do you think they are?
questions.template: I think they are on the ___________.

questions.scenario: You want to buy a new phone. You will go to the store after work today.

questions.text: What do you want to buy?
questions.template: I want to buy a new ___________.

questions.scenario: The weather is very cold today. You need to wear a warm jacket and a scarf.

questions.text: What do you need to wear?
questions.template: I need to wear a warm ___________ and scarf.

questions.scenario: Your mother is cooking dinner in the kitchen. She is making pasta with tomato sauce.
You have a test tomorrow. You need to study tonight and go to bed early.

questions.text: What do you need to do tonight?

questions.scenario: Your dog is hungry. You will give him some food and fresh water.

questions.template: I will give him ___________ and water.

questions.scenario: You are learning to play the guitar. You practice every day for thirty minutes.

questions.template: I am learning to play the ___________.

questions.scenario: Your sister is sick. She has a headache and a fever. She needs to rest.

questions.text: What does she need to do?

questions.scenario: You are planning a picnic in the park on Sunday. You will bring sandwiches and fruit.
